column4: what else besides nvidia driver will stop working with the new kernel that i should keep in mind?!
i don't know, but possibly vmware player, since that's already happened in the past. haven't checked it out, though
at any rate, you can always boot the old kernel from GRUB, in any event
glad i am not using vmware, but stuff like Lirc has to recompilled, but that's no hell, wifi? Yes, using old kernel.... grom, if it's new i want it! lol =D
